title: Game very unresponsive
body: For some odd reason, everytime I play on my smurf account, the game feels very unresponsive and I can definitely feel the delay even though I have 70ms. On my main account everything is fine no lag, everything runs smooth. Can anyone give me a clear explanation to this issue and how I can fix it?

replies.body: This sounds like an unstable connection, and likely a coincidence that things seem to work fine on another account.  Just to be sure, run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of these games.  I suspect that the culprit might be a degrading connection causing packet loss.  Let me know what you find!

Thanks for the info!  This could be caused by a degrading or unstable connection when reaching the game server, but there are steps to resolve that!  Go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshot this towards a fix.  I hope that helps!
